refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: oci_close closes the Oracle connection connection.

note.para: As non-persistent links are closed automatically at the end of script execution, calling this function is not required. Because of this and the method the extension uses to handle connection resources, oci_close currently provides no actual functionality.

In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ociclose instead. This name still can be used, it was left as alias of oci_close for downwards compatability. This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
